Container.Name: epicgames-freebies-claimer
Container.Overview:
Claim available free game promotions from the Epic Games Store.
Currently not working anymore, see https://github.com/Revadike/epicgames-freebies-claimer/pull/184
Default config.json: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Revadike/epicgames-freebies-claimer/master/data/config.example.json Application for device_auths.json: https://github.com/jackblk/DeviceAuthGenerator/releases
Explanation: https://github.com/Revadike/epicgames-freebies-claimer/wiki/User-Guide-(Docker)#export-your-epicgames-secrets
Container.Description:
Claim available free game promotions from the Epic Games Store.
Currently not working anymore, see https://github.com/Revadike/epicgames-freebies-claimer/pull/184
Default config.json: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Revadike/epicgames-freebies-claimer/master/data/config.example.json Application for device_auths.json: https://github.com/jackblk/DeviceAuthGenerator/releases
Explanation: https://github.com/Revadike/epicgames-freebies-claimer/wiki/User-Guide-(Docker)#export-your-epicgames-secrets
Container.Requires: Custom generated config.json and device_auths.json (See Description)

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: Place in this folder your config.json & device_auths.json
